mapper.select: SELECT device.device_id AS deviceId, device.device_name AS deviceName, device.device_type_id AS deviceTypeId, device.device_status_id AS deviceStatusId, device.device_status AS deviceStatus, device.device_purchase_date AS devicePurchaseDate, device.device_purchase_price AS devicePurchasePrice, device.device_manufacture_date AS deviceManufactureDate, device.device_service_life AS deviceServiceLife, device.device_keeper_id AS deviceKeeperId, device.note FROM device
